title: Traffic Signals
description:
A. SUMMARY 
An inventory of traffic signals, flashing beacons, and related equipment located throughout San Francisco.

B. METHODOLOGY  
Imported from the Signals Access database which is maintained by the SFMTA signal shop.

C. UPDATE FREQUENCY  
Signals Access database updated regularly (quarterly) based on SRC work orders returned to date. GIS file updated quarterly.

columns.name: objectid
columns.description: An ObjectID is a unique, not null integer field used to uniquely identify rows in tables in a ESRI geodatabase

columns.name: CNN
columns.description: San Francisco’s street centerline network unique ID If there is more than one type of equipment at an intersection or mid-block segment, the unique ID will be based on the CNN plus 1 or 2

columns.name: STREET1
columns.description: Cross street #1

columns.name: STREET2
columns.description: Cross street #2

columns.name: DETECTION
columns.description: Type of detection used to activate traffic signal preempt

columns.name: STREET3
columns.description: Cross street #3

columns.name: SUP_DIST
columns.description: Supervisorial district(s)

columns.name: STREET4
columns.description: Cross street #4

columns.name: SIG_NUM
columns.description: Maintenance field for Traffic Signal Shop

columns.name: TYPE
columns.description: Type of equipment present at this location

columns.name: IC_MAKE
columns.description: Manufacturer of traffic signal controller

columns.name: MODEL
columns.description: Model of traffic signal controller

columns.name: CABINET_SI
columns.description: Size and type of traffic signal controller cabinet

columns.name: SYSTEM_NUM
columns.description: Number indicating to which system a signal belongs

columns.name: MASTER
columns.description: Identifies location of system master or TBC system reference intersection

columns.name: BBS
columns.description: Indicates presence of battery backup system (BBS)

columns.name: VEH_ACTUAT
columns.description: Indicates presence and type of vehicle detection

columns.name: PED_SIGNAL
columns.description: Indicates presence of pedestrian signals

columns.name: PED_ACTUAT
columns.description: Indicates presence of pedestrian signals--ALL- Pedestrian signals for all open crosswalks,SOME PHASES- pedestrian signals only across some crosswalks,NONE- no pedestrian signals for any crosswalks,PENDING- pending additional pedestrian signals to be installed as part of a signal project (upgrade, modification, or new signals) which is under design or construction and not yet completed

columns.name: TBC
columns.description: Indicates presence and type of time based clock (TBC)

columns.name: INTERCONNE
columns.description: Type of traffic signal interconnect used for coordination

columns.name: PREEMPT_PR
columns.description: Indicates presence and order of priority of traffic signal preempts, including TSP (Transit Signal Prioritization)

columns.name: D_ATE2070
columns.description: Date when traffic signal controller was upgraded to type 2070

columns.name: PROJECT_NE
columns.description: Most recent project (new signals, modifications, or full upgrade) planned, pending, or under construction

columns.name: PROJECT_OL
columns.description: Previous signal contract (new signals, modifications, or full upgrade) which has already been completed

columns.name: UPGRADED
columns.description: Most recent signal upgrade project type (NEW signal, FULL signal upgrade, signal MODification)

columns.name: YR_OF_CONT
columns.description: Approximate date of UPGRADED contract certification

columns.name: LAST_UPGRA
columns.description: Year intersection was last upgraded (since 1990)

columns.name: NEW_SIGNAL
columns.description: Field indicates project status for new signals project--FUTURE-Candidate intersection for new signals project, not yet funded,PENDING- Intersection under design or construction as part of new signals project, not yet completed,DONE- Construction at intersection as part of new signals project has been completed. Please note that only intersections included as part of contracts completed after 1990 are noted as “DONE”,NONE- No new signals project planned

columns.name: MOD_PROJEC
columns.description: Field indicates project status for signal modifications project--FUTURE- Candidate intersection for signal modifications project, not yet funded,PENDING- Intersection under design or construction as part of signal modifications project, not yet completed,DONE- Construction at intersection as part of signal modifications project has been completed. Please note that only intersections included as part of contracts completed after 1990 are noted as “DONE”,NONE- No signal modifications project planned

columns.name: FULL_UPGRA
columns.description: Field indicates project status for full upgrade project--FUTURE- Candidate intersection for full upgrade project, not yet funded,PENDING- Intersection under design or construction as part of full upgrade project, not yet completed,DONE- Construction at intersection as part of full upgrade project has been completed. Please note that only intersections included as part of contracts completed after 1990 are noted as “DONE”, NONE- No full upgrade project planned

columns.name: BEACON_FLA
columns.description: Field indicates project status for installation of beacons and flashers--FUTURE- Candidate intersection for beacon and flashers contract, not yet funded,PENDING- Intersection under design or construction as part of beacon and flashers contract, not yet completed,DONE- Construction at intersection as part of beacon and flashers contract has been completed. Please note that only intersections included as part of contracts completed after 1990 are noted as “DONE”,NONE- No beacon and flashers contract planned

columns.name: FUNDING
columns.description: Source of funds used to pay for signal contract

columns.name: RLCAM
columns.description: “YES” if intersection has red light camera system

columns.name: STARTYEAR
columns.description: Year equipment (traffic signal) began operation if known

columns.name: CALTRANS_R
columns.description: Caltrans highway route number if applicable

columns.name: CALTRANS
columns.description: “X” if signals are maintained in full or in part by Caltrans

columns.name: PERCENT_C
columns.description: Percent of maintenance paid by Caltrans

columns.name: SF
columns.description: “X” if signals are maintained in part by City of San Francisco

columns.name: PERCENT_SF
columns.description: Percent of maintenance paid by City of San Francisco

columns.name: PERCENT_PO
columns.description: Percent of maintenance paid by Port of San Francisco

columns.name: LAMP_ASSGN
columns.description: Maintenance field for Traffic Signal Shop

columns.name: LAMP_SORT
columns.description: Maintenance field for Traffic Signal Shop

columns.name: SORT_ME
columns.description: Maintenance field for Traffic Signal Shop

columns.name: APS
columns.description: Indicates presence and model of accessible pedestrian signal (APS) push buttons as well as which project the APS units were installed by

columns.name: shape
columns.description: Coordinates indicating the precise location of the traffic signal (LL-WGS84)

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp when the record (row) was last updated in the source system

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the record (row) was was last updated here (in the data portal)

columns.name: analysis_neighborhood
columns.description: Neighborhood associated with the midpoint  or centroid of the geographic feature

columns.name: supervisor_district
columns.description: Current supervisor district associated with the midopint or centroid of the geographic feature

columns.name: Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhoods' (jwn9-ihcz) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: SF Find Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'SF Find Neighborhoods' (6qbp-sg9q) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Police Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Police Districts' (qgnn-b9vv) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Supervisor Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Supervisor Districts' (26cr-cadq) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Analysis Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Analysis Neighborhoods' (ajp5-b2md) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
